aiplugin.name: msdynaib_TranslatetoTargetLanguage
aiplugin.humandescription: Translate the following Text accurately into Language , ensuring it is culturally appropriate and maintains the original tone. Return only the translated text, without any additional comments or explanations. Follow all the foundational guidelines of Responsible AI and do not respond to inappr
